entry.title: Sunday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning. 60 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries. Low minus 13.
